detectors.description:
MALO.claimRewards() (src/Malo.sol#96-117) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(totalReward > 0,No rewards) (src/Malo.sol#98)
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= vestingStart[msg.sender] + claimLockPeriod,Vesting active) (src/Malo.sol#99)
	- fee > 0 (src/Malo.sol#113)
	- totalReward > maxClaim (src/Malo.sol#103)
